: : Skulletron : :

A big, slimy tongue, credit to the Slaughter side of Sk=
ulletron, licks Skulletron's "lips".  The Slaughter part of him saw this as=
 a dinner.  Skulletron saw it as his  duty, as well as a chance to toy arou=
nd.  He figured he would use his mental  ability for the first time in a lo=
ng time to play around with the Tripeds.

Skulletron:  Will do, Megatron.

=
Skulletron heads out, and transforms to beast mode, a hyena which was sligh=
tly deformed thanks to Slaughter.  He starts running beside Wolfenstein.

S=
kulletron(speaking as Slaughter):  Luuncchh timee!!!
  ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
  From: RoboRick007 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturd=
ay, August 17, 2002 11:34 PM
  Subject: Re: Preds to the Control Room


  :=
 : Wolfenstein : :

  The wolf bot takes in the location of the Tripred bas=
e from the map. He loads his plasma rifle and arms it.

  Wolfenstein: Yes =
sir!

  Wolfenstein starts to head out, hopeing that others will be right w=
ith him.

  Wolfenstein: Beast mode!

  After giveing his activation code, =
he transformed to wolf mode. He then breaks into a run for the Tripred base=
.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: x_rauq_x 
    To: nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, August 17, 2002 11:26 PM
    Subject: Re: =
Preds to the Control Room


    -- Megatron --

    Megatron listens intent=
ly to Flicker as the bot explains his plan of 
    infiltrating the Maximal=
 Base. The plan sounds feasible, and since 
    he wouldn't have to do anyt=
hing but watch Flicker work, it suited 
    him fine.

    "Hmmm, I will al=
low you to do this... In fact, this will work well 
    with my plans to at=
tack the Tripredacus base. Those insolent fools 
    will pay for their stu=
pidity." Megatron smiles cruelly, "We shall 
    attack as soon as you get =
to the Maximal Base. I, however, will not 
    be carrying one of those com=
municators, Switchblade will." 

    Megatron motions for Switchblade to ap=
proach and take one. He wasn't 
    taking any chances, if there was a bomb=
 or something like that in 
    the communication device, he didn't want to=
 be wearing 
    it. "Switchblade."

    "Yes Megs, you want me to wear the=
 device as a precaution right?" 
    Switchblade nods in acceptance, "Alrig=
ht, I'll do it then." He walks 
    over to Flicker, and takes one of the c=
ommunication devices from 
    him, then waits for instructions on how to i=
nstall it.

    Megatron nods approval, then turns to the rest of the Preda=
cons 
    pressent, "Now, the Tripredacus shall PAY. All Predacon troops mo=
ve 
    out to the Tripred base, but approach silently, so as to not trigge=
r 
    the sensory array." Megatron moves his hands over a console on his 
=
    chair.

    An image of the world map that they'd compiled from explora=
tion, and 
    from educated guessing, and Megatron put a little marker on =
it which 
    signified about where the Tripred base would be located.

   =
 "Predacons. MOVE OUT."

    ooC: I hope that wasn't too hasty...


    ---=

 over to the computer and scans his communicators into

    > totally undetectable by =

ing to Black Aracnia via psychic link, only 
    they 
    > aren't implant=
ed into your brain.  I intend to discuise myself as 
    a

nd hence get into their organization, and send you 
    > information on al=
l their operations, it's that simple.
